option.description: ECH, External Clock, High Power Mode (4-20 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECH

option.description: ECM, External Clock, Medium Power Mode (0.5-4 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECM

option.description: ECL, External Clock, Low Power Mode (0-0.5 MHz): device clock supplied to CLKIN pin
option.name: ECL

option.description: INTOSC oscillator: I/O function on CLKIN pin
option.name: INTOSC

option.description: WDT enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: WDT enabled while running and disabled in Sleep
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: WDT controlled by the SWDTEN bit in the WDTCON register
option.name: SWDTEN

option.description: WDT disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: PWRT disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: PWRT enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is MCLR
option.name: ON

option.description: MCLR/VPP pin function is digital input
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory code protection is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Program memory code protection is enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Brown-out Reset enabled while running and disabled in Sleep
option.name: NSLEEP

option.description: Brown-out Reset controlled by the SBOREN bit in the BORCON register
option.name: SBODEN

option.description: Brown-out Reset disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is disabled. I/O or oscillator function on the CLKOUT pin
option.name: OFF

option.description: CLKOUT function is enabled on the CLKOUT pin
option.name: ON

option.description: Write protection off
option.name: OFF

option.description: 000h to 1FFh write protected, 200h to FFFh may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: BOOT

option.description: 000h to 7FFh write protected, 800h to FFFh may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: HALF

option.description: 000h to FFFh write protected, no addresses may be modified by PMCON control
option.name: ALL

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will cause a Reset
option.name: ON

option.description: Stack Overflow or Underflow will not cause a Reset
option.name: OFF

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (Vbor), low trip point selected.
option.name: LO

option.description: Brown-out Reset Voltage (Vbor), high trip point selected.
option.name: HI

option.description: Low-Power BOR is disabled
option.name: OFF

option.description: Low-Power BOR is enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: Low-voltage programming enabled
option.name: ON

option.description: High-voltage on MCLR/VPP must be used for programming
option.name: OFF

setting.name: SMP
setting.description: SPI Data Input Sample Phase bit

setting.name: SSPM
setting.description: Synchronous Serial Port Mode Select bits

setting.name: CKP
setting.description: SPI Clock Polarity Select bit/I2C Clock stretch

setting.name: RSEN
setting.description: : Repeated Start Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: PEN
setting.description: Stop Condition Enable bit (Master mode only)

setting.name: ACKEN
setting.description: Acknowledge Sequence Enable bit (Master Receive mode only)

setting.name: GCEN
setting.description: General Call Enable bit (Slave mode only)

setting.name: AHEN
setting.description: Address Hold Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SBCDE
setting.description: Slave mode Bus Collision Detect Enable bit (I2C Slave mode only)

setting.name: SDAHT
setting.description: SDA Hold Time selection bit (I2C mode only)

setting.name: ACKTIM
setting.description: Acknowledge Time Status bit (I2C Slave mode only)
